26 #define A2D_ADDR_1 0x40
27 #define A2D_ADDR_2 0x41
28 
29 int main(int argc, char **argv){
30  /* Initialise the ROS node */
31  ros::init(argc, argv, "pol_op_test");
32  ros::NodeHandle n;
33 
34  /* Initialise polarisation opponent device */
35  std::string bus = "/dev/i2c-1";
36  POL_OP po(bus, A2D_ADDR_1, A2D_ADDR_2, false);
37 
38  /* Read from the photodiodes and print the output at the terminal. */
39  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
40  while(ros::ok()) {
41  int readings[4];
42  bool succcess = po.read_sensor(readings);
43 
44  std::stringstream outstr;
45  outstr <<
46  "Readings: \n";
47  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++){
48  outstr << "R" << i+1 << ": " << (int) readings[i] << "\n";
49  }
50  ROS_INFO(outstr.str().c_str());
51 
52  ros::spinOnce();
53  loop_rate.sleep();
54  }
55 
56  return 0;
57 }
